about_the_game:
Fall of Bali is a historical strategy game set in Bali in the 19th Century AD. Many Balinese kingdoms were at war with each other and were spreading their influence out to both Blambangan and Lombok Island. Hence, the realm of Bali had been divided for a long time. The successor to the Bali Empire, Klungkung, was only recognized as a spiritual leader for Balinese kings, which drove the other kings to pursue the highest achievement: the ambition to become the superior ruler of Bali. Meanwhile as time passes on, the growing threat of a colonial power from the Dutch Empire in Java will soon reaches Bali.

Build your kingdom by managing structures, resources, and economy in each cities or villages. Begin your expansions to the other kingdoms, order your troops to go to war or go out your way to arrange diplomatic relations. Plan your strategy carefully to achieve the main objective. Rise to become the supreme king or Susuhunan.

In Fall of Bali demo, the game begins in 1771 with Buleleng as your kingdom. Explore Bali with Buleleng in 1 year and you will know Fall of Bali.

short_description: Fall of Bali is a historical strategy simulator city set in Bali set around 19th century. Divided in many kingdoms after fall of Bali Empire, Bali has fall in warring era for nearly 2 centuries and now the threat of imperialism come. With all your kingdom potential, can you survive and win this era?
